name: Jailhouse Accommodation Christchurch
description:
Lock in your stay at Jailhouse Accommodation.

At Jailhouse Accommodation you’re not just booking a bed, you’re booking a story to tell. Our renovated prison is one of Christchurch’s most unique stays, voted a top pick by Hostelworld, Lonely Planet and Rough Guides. Enjoy free WiFi, free off-street parking, and award-winning facilities.

Rooms & Facilities

* Super-comfy beds with fresh linen, fully made up.

* Room types: singles, doubles, twins, dorms, and larger rooms ideal for families or groups.

* Travelling with under-16s? Please book a private room, not a dorm.

* Extras include: movie rooms with Disney+ and Netflix, pool table, darts, guest kitchen, laundry, and towel hire.

* Fully secure, after all, it used to be a Jail!

Location & Local Favourites

* Closest hostel to TranzAlpine Train Station, Apollo Projects Stadium, Nga Puna Wai Sports Hub, and Wolfbrook Arena.

* Easy walk or short bus ride to Hagley Park, the beautiful Botanic Gardens, the Christchurch Arts Centre, and the vibrant new CBD. Home to cool bars, shops, laneways, and the famous Riverside Market, buzzing with street food, local produce, and boutique stalls.

In Addington you’ll find plenty of local flavour: grab your morning coffee and hearty brunch at Addington Coffee Co-op, enjoy relaxed dining or a craft beer at The Pedal Pusher, and don’t miss a generous platter at the iconic Afghan Restaurant, a true Christchurch must-try.

Check-in & Access

* Contactless self check-in with secure GOKI digital locks.

* PIN code emailed on the morning of arrival.

* Want it via text? Use the pre check-in link after booking to add your phone number.

* Late arrivals welcome. Access pins work 24/7. (We recommend booking a private room if arriving late to respect dorm guests.)

Before You Arrive – Good to Know

We like to keep things simple so you can focus on enjoying your stay:

* Payment: All stays are paid in advance by credit or debit card (2% fee applies).

* Cancellations: Within policy, refunds are available minus a small 2% admin fee.

* Cards: Please make sure your card details are up to date. If a card declines, you’ll have time to update it (12 hours, or 2 hours for same-day bookings).

* Arriving late? No worries. Just make sure you book for the correct date if you’ll be arriving after midnight.

* House respect: Charges may apply for no-shows, late cancellations, damage, smoking/vaping indoors, or anything that disturbs fellow guests.

Why Stay With Us?

Because no one ever forgets their first night in jail.

BOOK YOUR STAY. DO SOME TIME.
hostelworldSays: Jailhouse Accommodation was rated #1 in New Zealand and Oceania at the 2009 and 2013 Hoscars, and it's not hard to see why. This quirky, clean, comfortable and quiet hostel is set in a historic former jail. It's located about 20 minutes' walk from the Arts Centre, Christchurch Art Gallery, Canterbury Museum and the Botanic Gardens and is surrounded by a variety of bars and cafes. We like their friendly and very helpful staff, who have a great knowledge of the area.

groupInformation.terms: Groups of more than 10 pax are subject to a 30 day 100% due cancellation policy.  Cancellations must be emailed.
groupInformation.cancellationTerms: No refund on balance if cancelled within 4 weeks of arrival, or reduction in numbers.  Cancellations required in writing.
groupInformation.additionalTerms: To avoid noise complaints no drinking for groups on the premises.  Quiet zone in Atrium area 9pm-8am.

houseRules.notes:
We operate with contactless self check-in, you need to check your emails on arrival morning to get your 'Goki' lock access Pin codes to the building and your room.  We welcome late night arrivals - just use your access Pins. 


Refunds due to early cancellation will be subject to an administration fee.  If arriving after midnight, please ensure you have booked for the correct date (the date prior to midnight).  We prefer you book a Private Room for late arrivals so you don't disturb other Dorm Guests.

Guests under 16 years of age must stay in private rooms, not shared dorms.
Credit /Debit cards are pre-charged and may be subject to bank service fees of 2%.  Cash not accepted.
Photo ID will be requested on arrival.

Credit card used to make booking will also be used to charge no shows, cancellations within cancellation policy, or for wilful damage, theft, additional cleaning, smoking/vaping inside, inappropriate behavior or breaching terms

Mobile phone number needs to be supplied for all bookings.
